Title: Collating Their Research
Description:
It no longer matters how the Sundered Flame got here; now we need to know why. What is in this vault that Sarkareth is after?

$n, while you are in their camp, look for notes, research papers, journals--anything you can find that might reveal their intentions. Please bring whatever you find to me.
ObjectivesText: Find out why the Sundered Flame expedition is in Zaralek Cavern.
